name: Clothing
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  Clothing is the base class for the Class.Shirt and Class.Pants clothing
  objects.
description: |
  The base class for clothing objects.
codesamples: []
inherits:
  - CharacterAppearance
descendants:
  - Pants
  - Shirt
tags:
  - NotCreatable
deprecationmessage: ''
properties:
  - name: Clothing.Color3
    summary: |
      Determines the colorization to be applied to the Class.Clothing texture.
    description: |
      This property determines the colorization to be applied to the
      Class.Clothing texture. The default colorization value is
      Datatype.Color3|Color3.new(1, 1, 1) (white), at which no colorization
      occurs.

      This property is useful for creating outfits that have many different
      color variations but share the same basic look, possibly for a character
      creator in a roleplaying game or generating a lot of different varied
      NPCs.

      See also Class.ShirtGraphic.Color3 which determines the colorization to
      be applied to the Class.ShirtGraphic texture.
    codesamples: []
    type: Color3
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Appearance
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Avatar
methods: []
events: []
callbacks: []",
